markdown:
<title level="1" right="Deity " pfs="Standard">[Imot (The Symbol of Doom)](/Deities.aspx?ID=139)</title>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<traits>
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
</traits>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Gods & Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=17) pg. 130 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

_Nethys Note: no description has been provided of this deity_

<column gap="tiny">

**Category** [Monitor Demigods
](/DeityCategories.aspx?ID=12)

**Edicts** Search for omens in the natural world, push the boundaries of mathematics, study past disasters

**Anathema** Withhold your understanding of a portent, prevent the destruction of things that cannot be saved

**Follower Alignments**
LN, N, NE

</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
<title level="2">Devotee Benefits</title>

<column gap="tiny">

**[Divine Ability](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=132)**
Strength or Intelligence

**Divine Font** [Harm](/Spells.aspx?ID=146) or [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148)

**Divine Skill** [Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11)

**Favored Weapon** [Shield Boss](/Weapons.aspx?ID=41)

**Domains** [Death](/Domains.aspx?ID=7), [Destruction](/Domains.aspx?ID=8), [Fate](/Domains.aspx?ID=12), [Glyph](/Domains.aspx?ID=46)

**[Alternate Domains](/Rules.aspx?ID=802)** 

**Cleric Spells**

- **1st**
[Ill Omen](/Spells.aspx?ID=696)

- **2nd**
[Paranoia](/Spells.aspx?ID=214)

- **6th**
[Phantasmal Calamity](/Spells.aspx?ID=218)

</column>
name: Imot (The Symbol of Doom)
